title: The Shared Values Edition
description:
Felix Salmon of Fusion, senior strategy officer of a political risk startup Anna Szymanski, and Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann discuss:
-       The rising stock market
-       The composition of index funds
-       Etsy
Check out other Panoply podcasts at megaphone.fm.
Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Twitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @JHWeissmann
Production by Daniel Schroeder
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
